comments.author: Berly
comments.body: Well, it's now or never! I'll see you frenzy freaks at noon and will await taunting when I cannot find my way off the small ring. Well, maybe on the downhill.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Berly, Rest assured, you won't be the only one spinning "granny gears"! I'll be riding my 34x27, so I'm king of the wimps! I'm not afraid to say it either. Adriana's coming too, so it'll be lots of fun.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Don't have the bike today and am feeling more like lunch on the Hill anyway. Anybody want to join me? Riders are welcome too.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Dennis is going to be bummed that you're not riding the Jamis today, Greg. I saw him yesterday, and he was gleaming with pride that you've been riding so fast on his loaner bike. What will you tell him? Tisk, tisk.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm excited about this ride today, me droogs, but all this talk about chain rings makes my head hurt. It's very technical stuff for a sensitive artiste like me to contemplate. Hell, I just found out that those cables go to the _back_ wheel! See ya' in a few, DU
